import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ProfileFormService } from '../services/profile-form.service'; import { Person } from '../models/Person.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-patients', templateUrl: './patients.component.html', styleUrls: ['./patients.component.css'] }) export class PatientsComponent implements OnInit { patients: Person[]=[]; constructor(public profileFormService: ProfileFormService) { } ngOnInit() { this.profileFormService.getAllPatients() .subscribe({ next: res => { this.patients = res; } }) } }
